casebody.data:
TRATAROS CONSTRUCTION, INC., ET AL. v. ROJAC COMPANY, INC. ROJAC COMPANY, INC. v. TRATAROS CONSTRUCTION, INC., ET AL. (13941) (13942)

O’Connell, Heiman and Spear, Js.

Argued December 4, 1995 decision released January 9, 1996 *903Edward J. Dolan, with whom, on the brief, was Kent Harvey, for the appellants (plaintiffs in the first case, defendants in the second case). Daniel P. Scapellati, for the appellee (defendant in the first case, plaintiff in the second case). PER CURIAM.

The judgments are affirmed.
